room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Charlotte in Charlotte
review: Such a good time! My group played the Kidnapping room and it really fun but also challenging. Jen was a great Gamemaster. Made the time much more enjoyable. I can't wait to come back.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Charlotte in Charlotte
review: My family and I got kidnapped and it was a blast. The puzzle we're fun and challenging. I especially liked starting off handcuffed. I will definitely be back next time I am in town.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Charlotte in Charlotte
review: Got together with my sisters and got kidnapped. We had so much fun from start to finish. The staff was great and supportive throughout the entire game. We are already looking at returning a few times. Go - you won't be disappointed!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Charlotte in Charlotte
review: Yesterday was my first time at Breakout Games! It was five of us girls trying to escape the Kidnapping room. We had such an awesome time! It was so much fun! Our game master Casey was pretty awesome herself! We did beat the room with about 8 minutes to spare and only using 4 hints! We will definitely be coming back very soon!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Charlotte in Charlotte
review: Awesome experience, had a lot of fun trying to escape the Kidnapping room.
